title: Motoring Journalist Alex Goy!
description:
Alex Goy is a British motoring journalist whose work can be seen on Jalopnik, Carfection, and DriveTribe, both in words and video. Like our similarly-named, similarly-styled, and also bald friend Alex ROY, Alex GOY also drives a Morgan Three-Wheeler.

Follow us! T: @thesmokingtire @zackklapman

IG: @thesmokingtire @fakezackklapman @a1goy

NEW SHIRTS! https://www.blipshift.com/tst

Watch the show! https://youtu.be/RBxQZzOqFnU
author: matt@thesmokingtire.com (Matt Farah & Zack Klapman)
